fields.name: lat
fields.title: Latitude in decimal degrees (EPSG:4326)

fields.name: lon
fields.title: Longitude in decimal degrees (EPSG:4326)

fields.name: genus
fields.title: Botanical genus, in title case (e.g. Eucalyptus)

fields.name: species
fields.title: Botanical species, in title case (e.g. Regnans)

fields.name: dbh
fields.title: Diameter at breast height (130cm above ground), in centimeters. If this information is available only as a range, this contains the middle of the range.

fields.name: dbh_min
fields.title: Minimum diameter at breast height (130cm above ground)

fields.name: dbh_max
fields.title: Maximum diameter at breast height (130cm above ground)

fields.name: year_min
fields.title: Lower bound on year that tree is expected to live to (e.g. A tree surveyed in 2008 with useful life expectancy range of 10-15 years would be 2018).

fields.name: year_max
fields.title: Upper bound on year that tree is expected to live to (e.g. A tree surveyed in 2008 with useful life expectancy range of 10-15 years would be 2023).

fields.name: crown
fields.title: Width in metres of the treeâ€™s foliage (also known as crown spread). If this information is available only as a range, this contains the middle of the range.

fields.name: crown_min
fields.title: Minimum width in meters of the tree's foliage

fields.name: crown_max
fields.title: Maximum width in meters of the tree's foliage

fields.name: height
fields.title: Height in meters. If this information is available only as a range, this contains the middle of the range.

fields.name: height_min
fields.title: Minimum height in meters

fields.name: height_max
fields.title: Maximum height in meters

fields.name: common
fields.title: Common name for species (non-standardised)

fields.name: location
fields.title: Where the tree is located

fields.name: ref
fields.title: Council-specific identifier, enabling joining to other datasets

fields.name: maintenance
fields.title: How often the tree is inspected (in months)

fields.name: planted
fields.title: Date of planting

fields.name: updated
fields.title: Date of addition to database or most recent revision

fields.name: health
fields.title: Health of tree growth

fields.name: variety
fields.title: Any part of the scientific name below species level, including subspecies or variety

fields.name: description
fields.title: Other information about the tree that is not in its scientific name or species

fields.name: family
fields.title: Botanical family

fields.name: ule_min
fields.title: Lower bound on useful life expectancy when surveyed

fields.name: ule_max
fields.title: Upper bound on useful life expectancy when surveyed

fields.name: address
fields.title: Street address
